scripts.build: mode=${npm_config_mode:-chrome} && vite build --config vite.popup.config.js --mode $mode && vite build --config vite.background.config.js --mode $mode && vite build --config vite.welcome.config.js --mode $mode && vite build --config vite.content_script.config.js --mode $mode && mkdir -p dist_$mode && rsync -av output_background_script/* dist_$mode && rsync -av output_popup/* dist_$mode && rsync -av output_welcome/* dist_$mode && rsync -av output_content_script/* dist_$mode && rm dist_$mode/index.html && node scripts/post-build.js --mode $mode
scripts.build:all: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox && npm run build:edge && npm run zip:all
scripts.zip:all: zip -r "focused-youtube-chrome.zip" dist_chrome && zip -r "focused-youtube-edge.zip" dist_edge && cd dist_firefox && zip -r "../focused-youtube-firefox.zip" .
scripts.dev: nodemon --ext js,vue,css,json,svg,png,html,ttf --watch 'src/**' --watch 'public/**' --watch 'platforms/**' --exec 'npm run build && npm run zip:all'
